item.title: My 8 Favorite Drone videos filmed and chosen by Me, Myself and I
item.description:
So here is a story for you. A few years ago, after I left my career in Silicon Valley, I decided to break bad üòÇ. I know, it sounds silly, but hey, I had fun. I spend almost two years being a full-time traveler (part-time remote engineer and part-time having-so-much-freakin-fun).

Here is my top drone videos from those wild timesL

1. Life is all about you & Not at all about you (2018)

Life is all about you & Not at all about you (2018) from Mia Steinkirch on Vimeo.

I just love this song Zhu, I can listen to it over and over. But the droning in this video is also really special to me because it was my first summer in SoCal üå¥.

2. Hawai‚Äôi Aerial Reel (2018)

Hawai'i Aerial Reel (2018) from Mia Steinkirch on Vimeo.

Living in Hawaii for almost 5 months in 4 different occasions was one of the best times in my life. The droning in this "reel" is so so beautiful, and it was so much fun to film. I will never forget those days üíñ.

3. Tiny Jaws (2018)

Tiny Jaws (2018) from Mia Steinkirch on Vimeo.

I always really wanted to go to Maui, it was itching. So I took two weeks off my job at Surfline in Huntington Beach and just travelled to a random hostel in Lahaina. It turned out it was in the other side of the island from Jaws, which was the place I really wanted to drone. I longboarded for hours with my drone in my backpack and a killer hot sun in my face. It was worth every second.

4. Santa Monica Daze (2018)

Santa Monica Daze (2018) from Mia Steinkirch on Vimeo.

S-O M-U-C-H F-E-E-L-Z. I can't even.

5. Go Skateboarding Day w/ Sierra Prescott (2018)

Go Skateboarding Day w/ Sierra Prescott (2018) from Mia Steinkirch on Vimeo.

So I meet this crazy good and famous LA local skateboarder and she let me hang out with her üê∞. Good summer times with badass gals.

6. Surf & Chill in Malibu (2018)

Surf & Chill in Malibu (2018) from Mia Steinkirch on Vimeo.

Malibu :). Thank you, Z. PS: I had a website miasteinkirch.com once and this was the opening (and 3k people loaded it? Waaaaat!)

7. Haleiwa Dreams (2018)

Haleiwa Dreams (2018) from Mia Steinkirch on Vimeo.

One of the best days of my life was when I was living in Haleiwa. Everything was magical and colorful. This video is my dream ‚ú®

8. Longboarding Haleiwa (2018)

Longboarding Haleiwa (2018) from Mia Steinkirch on Vimeo.

OK, the surf sucks because there were no waves but this video still gives me the chills, I was 100% happy and this is not easy as a human in 2018. Plus, Post Malone wrote this song for me. ‚ò†Ô∏è

Bonus: These ones are just hilariously bad and good, I don't know ü§∑üèº‚Äç‚ôÄ

It‚Äôs Summer in the Pipe! (2018)

It's Summer in the Pipe! (2018) from Mia Steinkirch on Vimeo.

Surfing Venice Beach (2018)

Surfing Venice Beach (2018) from Mia Steinkirch on Vimeo.

Skateboarding the Pipeline (2018)

Skateboarding the Pipeline (2018) from Mia Steinkirch on Vimeo.

Skateboarding Poods (2018)

Skateboarding Poods (2018) from Mia Steinkirch on Vimeo.

Wake up High in Encinitas (2018)

Wake up High in Encinitas (2018) from Mia Steinkirch on Vimeo.

Aloha, bt3
item.dc:creator: Mia Steinkirch
